hat causes What I need to know about Hirschsprung Disease ?,"Before birth, a childs nerve cells normally grow along the intestines in the direction of the anus. With HD, the nerve cells stop growing too soon. Why the nerve cells stop growing is unclear. Some HD is inherited, meaning it is passed from parent to child through genes. HD is not caused by anything a mother did while pregnant.",NIDDK,What I need to know about Hirschsprung Disease
